en.title: FE Circus Big Top Convention.
en.content:
FE Circus Big Top Convention on Saturday, 08th September 2007 was a huge success with 3,500 attendees from all over Malaysia and overseas! Everyone had a great time being entertained by the world class Royal London Circus.

FE would like to thank all our leaders, members and Mr Paul Lee and his wife, Doris of the Royal London Circus for making the event a successful and memorable one. 

We look forward to seeing you all again at our next event. Thank you!

meta.description:
FE Circus Big Top Convention on Saturday, 8th September 2007 was a huge success with 3,500 attendees from all over Malaysia and overseas! Everyone had a great time being entertained by the world class Royal London Circus.
FE would like to thank all our leaders, members and Mr Paul Lee and his wife, Doris of the Royal London Circus for making the eventa successful and memorable one. We look forward to seeing you all again at our next event. Thank you!
FE hosted "Buka Puasa" Buffet Dinner for its Muslim members who attended the Bahasa BEP at HQ last Tuesday 25th August 2009.
The "Buka Puasa" Buffet Dinner will be held at HQ every Tuesday at 7.00pm during the month of Ramadan in conjunction with the Bahasa BEPs. FE would like to wish all Muslim members " Selamat Berbuka Puasa!
meta.author: klhunter

meta.description:
